title: Peer pressure, drugs and you
creator_credit: Bossert and Company, Sunburst Communications, Carolyn Vanderslice and Robin Bossert
brief_description: Using case studies and examples, this program demonstrates assertiveness strategies for resisting peer pressure to use drugs. The program is divided into three parts, with each part examining a different aspect of peer pressure. This program will facilitate role-playing and provide techniques and strategies for resisting peer pressure in a number of situations.
